Material used.Description: The study used SH-SY5Y cells expressing wild-type and mutant PINK1.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells with c.109G>A showed reduced mitochondrial respiration by 40% compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated three times with independent cell cultures.

Technical replicates.Description: Each biological replicate was measured in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1-expressing cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-way ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitochondrial respiration greater than 85% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Mitochondrial respiration less than 60% of wild-type levels.
